summary: CV JOINT/BOOT ON FRONT OF 1998 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE LIMITED BROKE DROPPING THE FULL TIME 4 WHEEL DRIVE SHAFT.  AUTO PURCHASE INCLUDED 100% WARRANTY 1 YEAR OR 15,000 MILES ON INTERNAL POWERTRAIN.  WARRANTY CO. SAY DAMAGE IS NOT CONSIDERED PART OF INTERNAL POWERTRAIN.  TWO WEEKS AFTER LEAVING THE LOT, I NOW HAVE A 2-WHEEL DRIVE.  MY HUSBAND & I ORDERED A BRAND NEW CVJ/DRIVE SHAFT AND HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR OVER 2 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY, WE HAVE BEEN GIVEN THE RUN AROUND.   THE DEALER THAT WE BOUGHT THE PART THROUGH SAYS 118 OF THESE ARE CURRENTLY ON ORDER WITH THE MANUFACTURER AND THEY ARE ON B/O DUE TO THE DEMAND.  WE'VE MADE A PAYMENT ON A 4 X 4 AUTOMOBILE WE RODE FOR 2 WEEKS THAT IS NOW A PARKED 2 WHEEL DRIVE.   *NLM
